attributes.action: Close all schools down in the north of England
attributes.background: Close down secondary and primary schools in northern England

rejection.details:
It's not clear why or for how long you want schools to close.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to close schools in areas that have been designated as high or very high alert status, if that's what you want to happen.
